item.title: Song of the !kan ||ka ||karashe
item.summary: !nanni tells the song of the !kan ||ka ||karashe. This is a small animal eaten by the !kun which scratches out food from the ground called ||kauru.
item.comments: 1) See also Song of the sho sho and Song of the ||ku and The song of the Sauko and The song of the ||noruko djo-djo and The song of the mother of the little buck and The song of the ≠na≠n'arro and The song of the Ngogan-a (a little bird) and The song of the !ke tsa'ba (a bird) and The song of the ||gani (a bird) and The song of the !korro-ssin !ku (or Pit-making Bushmen) and A song of the |kam-ssin !ku (or Sun Bushmen) and The song of the !na !na'rishe (a bird), 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-1
item.author: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)
